table.name: civicrm_hrleaveandabsences_work_day
table.comment: The specific details of day in a Work Week.

field.name: day_of_the_week
field.label: Day of the Week
field.comment: A number between 1 and 7, following ISO-8601. 1 is Monday and 7 is Sunday

field.name: type
field.label: Type
field.comment: The type of this day: yes (working day), no (non working day), weekend

field.name: time_from
field.label: Time from
field.comment: The start time of this work day

field.name: time_to
field.label: Time to
field.comment: The end time of this work day

field.name: break
field.label: Break
field.comment: The amount of break time (in hours) allowed for this day.

field.name: leave_days
field.label: Leave days
field.comment: The proportion of a days leave that will be deducted if this day is taken as leave.

field.name: number_of_hours
field.label: Number of Hours
field.comment: This is the number of hours between time_from and time_to minus break

field.name: week_id
field.comment: The Work Week this Day belongs to
